snippet: We spend nearly $1 trillion a year for the needy. It isn’t working.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Gary E MacDougal, author and former business consultant and executive, underlines need for serious debate over question of how to lift 46 million Americans out of poverty; questions whether federal spending on helping the poor is being used wisely; expresses hope that issue will come up in vice-presidential debate.
lead_paragraph: We spend nearly $1 trillion a year for the needy. It isn’t working.

headline.main: The Wrong Way to Help the Poor
headline.print_headline: The Wrong Way to Help the Poor
